tag_list: dj, music, remix, webdesign, web-designer, adobe, ace
overview:
Djio, baptized as Dionizio Bonfim Bach, debuted as amateur DJ in 1991, while turning 17, in FlorianÃ³polis, Brazil. A little later he started professionally playing in parties and other events around the city. Since then, there are 15 years of history and sound.

Music changed, and Djio got along. Meanwhile he played several genres: Techno, Trance, Progressive House… Time passed and, as usual, good things last. The good and old House wins new clothing (Electro, Filtered, Disco, Funky, …) and is still his main work genre. Always searching for a fusion between the classics and news tendencies, researches ethnic rhythms, preferring brazilian, afro and latin sounds. His sets prime for the good musical taste with messages of a fun and optimistic life.

Besides DJing, he has more and more incursions in the musical production field. Already has participated in two CDs, from the Curitiba’s bands Golgotha and Sentido, produced the soundtrack for the short-length movie ‘Merde’ of Lucila Bach, also keeps a partnership with Isaac Varzin in the project called Twist-Cola, among others.

In 2002, moved definitively to Curitiba, where also works as a multimedia developer and designer; activities that adds lots to his musical work.
